name: AP_CLAIM_IF_DIAL_ADJ_RATE
description: This table extracts data received from prospective payment systems (PPS) pricer for a claim in POB3.ESRD 'Total ESRD PPS Payment Prior to Blending and Markup'.

columns.name: CLAIM_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the claim info record.

columns.name: GROUP_LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record.

columns.name: VALUE_LINE
columns.description: The line number of one of the multiple values associated with a specific group of data within this record.

columns.name: TOT_DIALYSIS_ADJ_RATE
columns.description: Identifies prospective payment dialysis amount prior to blending or user mark-up or discount. Data received in POB3.ESRD on incoming message.
